content: body and sleeves are worked in the round from lower edge to underarms then joined to work yoke in the round in celebration of our 20th anniversary istex the principal manufacturer of the renowned icelandic lopi yarn offers this traditional icelandic sweater pattern especially created for us by knitting designer védís jónsdóttir as a gift to all lopi knitters afmæli means anniversary in icelandic we hope you enjoy knitting this beautiful sweater
